data.name: Seven Deadly Dates Artbook + Wallpapers
data.detailed_description:
Artbook DLC for Seven Deadly Dates!!

Contains:

*An Artbook filled with exclusive info about the characters
*Concept sketches and concept work
*10+ Wallpapers
*All in-game CGS in HQ format
data.about_the_game:
Artbook DLC for Seven Deadly Dates!!

Contains:

*An Artbook filled with exclusive info about the characters
*Concept sketches and concept work
*10+ Wallpapers
*All in-game CGS in HQ format
data.short_description: Artbook DLC for Seven Deadly Dates!! Contains: *An Artbook filled with exclusive info about the characters *Concept sketches and concept work *10+ Wallpapers *All in-game CGS in HQ format

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Modern Intel/AMD CPU 1.6GHz+
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities. Anything made since 2004 should work.
  • DirectX: Version 5.2
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15.3
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Quad-Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB RAM Anything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
